temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: DShot capable ESCs are required for this mode to function, allowing the DShot reverse command to be sent to the ESCs.
SERVO_DSHOT_ESC must be set to a non-zero value and MOT_PWM_TYPE to a DSHOT value also, to allow DShot commands to be sent to the ESC.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( SERVO_DSHOT_ESC == anononzero and MOT_YPE == aDSHOTloOT )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 1.Turtle mode cannot be entered unless throttle is zero
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( rise ( 1 . Turtlecannot == unlnlesthrotltezero ) and rise ( rotlezero == roero ) )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 2.Upon entry to turtle mode the motors stay disarmed, but the notfiy LEDs flash
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( Uponentry == turtle or motdsdarmedbut == tnotfiyLEDsflash )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 3.Raising the throttle, the motors arm, and motors spin.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( Raisingthrotle == motorsarm and motorspin == mototorspin )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: Lowering throttle to zero disarms the motors
4.Motors spin only when throttle is raised
This flight mode is available for multirotors only.
